page.title: 17Pets as friends
page.content: I have two pets,one is a guinea pig,he is white with red eyes - an albino. We got him from a friend who owned his mother,he now lives with our rabbit. We have an old hen run in the garden which we let them run about in.Their food consists of dandelion leaves, carrots,cabbage and lettuce.I feed them every day before I go to school. My other pet is a cat called Sammy,he is black with yellow eyes. His tail is big and fluffy and he always seems to be making some kind of noise,either purring or miaowing. Sometimes he jumps on the table whilst we are eating our meal,he always seems to be hungry.We feed him every night on tinned cat food and fresh milk.
